verses.verse: Then they told <S%H5046><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> are fighting <S%H3898><s%> against Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and are plundering <S%H8154><s%> the threshing <S%H1637><s%> floors. <S%H1637><s%>"

So David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Shall I go <S%H1980><s%> and attack <S%H5221><s%> these <S%H428><s%> Philistines <S%H6430><s%>?" And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> and attack <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and deliver <S%H3467><s%> Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>"

But David's men <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are afraid <S%H3372><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> in Judah. <S%H3063><s%> How <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> more <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> then if <S%H3588><s%> we go <S%H1980><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the ranks <S%H4634><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>?"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> once <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> for I will give <S%H5414><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

So David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and he led <S%H5090><s%> away <S%H5090><s%> their livestock <S%H4735><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter. <S%H4347><s%> Thus David <S%H1732><s%> delivered <S%H3467><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> at Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> [that] he came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> [with] an ephod <S%H646><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

When it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H9330><s%> him into my hand, <S%H3027><s%> for he shut <S%H5462><s%> himself in by entering <S%H935><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> with double gates <S%H1817><s%> and bars. <S%H1280><s%>"

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> summoned <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> for war, <S%H4421><s%> to go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> to besiege <S%H6696><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men. <S%H376><s%>

Now David <S%H1732><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was plotting <S%H9177><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him; so he said <S%H559><s%> to Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> "Bring <S%H5066><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> here. <S%H5066><s%>"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> for certain <S%H8085><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> is seeking <S%H1245><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on my account. <S%H5668><s%>

"Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> surrender <S%H5462><s%> me into his hand <S%H3027><s%>? Will Saul <S%H7586><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%>? O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I pray, <S%H4994><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> Thy servant. <S%H5650><s%>" And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "He will come <S%H3381><s%> down. <S%H3381><s%>"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> surrender <S%H5462><s%> me and my men <S%H376><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>?" And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "They will surrender <S%H5462><s%> you."

Then David <S%H1732><s%> and his men, <S%H376><s%> about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and departed <S%H3318><s%> from Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> wherever <S%H834><s%> they could go. <S%H1980><s%> When it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had escaped <S%H4422><s%> from Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> he gave <S%H2308><s%> up the pursuit. <S%H3318><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in the strongholds, <S%H4679><s%> and remained <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph. <S%H2128><s%> And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> him every <S%H3605><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> did not deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Now David <S%H1732><s%> became <S%H7200><s%> aware <S%H7200><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> had come <S%H3318><s%> out to seek <S%H1245><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%> while David <S%H1732><s%> was in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph <S%H2128><s%> at Horesh. <S%H2793><s%>

And Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Saul's son, <S%H1121><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> at Horesh, <S%H2793><s%> and encouraged <S%H2388><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him in God. <S%H430><s%>

Thus he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Do not be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father shall not find <S%H1><s%> you, and you will be king <S%H4672><s%> over <S%H4427><s%> Israel <S%H5921><s%> and I will be next <S%H3478><s%> to you; and Saul <S%H4932><s%> my father knows <S%H7586><s%> that also. <S%H1><s%>"

So the two <S%H8147><s%> of them made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> at Horesh <S%H2793><s%> while Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Then Ziphites <S%H2130><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to Saul <S%H7586><s%> at Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Is David <S%H1732><s%> not hiding <S%H5641><s%> with us in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> at Horesh, <S%H2793><s%> on the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Hachilah, <S%H2444><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the south <S%H3225><s%> of Jeshimon <S%H3452><s%>?

"Now <S%H6258><s%> then, O king, <S%H4428><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the desire <S%H185><s%> of your soul <S%H5315><s%> to do <S%H3381><s%> so; <S%H3381><s%> and our part [shall be] to surrender <S%H5462><s%> him into the king's hand. <S%H3027><s%>"
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "May you be blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> for you have had <S%H2550><s%> compassion <S%H2550><s%> on me.

"Go <S%H1980><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> make <S%H3559><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> sure, <S%H3559><s%> and investigate <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> his haunt <S%H7272><s%> is, [and] who <S%H4310><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> him there; <S%H8033><s%> for I am told <S%H559><s%> that he is very <S%H6191><s%> cunning. <S%H6191><s%>

"So look, <S%H7200><s%> and learn <S%H3045><s%> about <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the hiding <S%H9255><s%> places <S%H9255><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he hides <S%H2244><s%> himself, and return <S%H7725><s%> to me with certainty, <S%H3559><s%> and I will go <S%H1980><s%> with you; and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about if <S%H518><s%> he is in the land <S%H776><s%> that I will search <S%H2664><s%> him out among all <S%H3605><s%> the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>"

Then they arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to Ziph <S%H2128><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul. <S%H7586><s%> Now David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> were in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon, <S%H4584><s%> in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> to the south <S%H3225><s%> of Jeshimon. <S%H3452><s%>

When Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> [him], they told <S%H5046><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and he came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the rock <S%H5553><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon. <S%H4584><s%> And when Saul <S%H7586><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> [it], he pursued <S%H7291><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon. <S%H4584><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on one <S%H2088><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> on the other <S%H2088><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> was hurrying <S%H2648><s%> to get <S%H1980><s%> away <S%H1980><s%> from Saul, <S%H7586><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> were surrounding <S%H9401><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> to seize <S%H8610><s%> them.

But a messenger <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Hurry <S%H4116><s%> and come, <S%H1980><s%> for the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have made <S%H6584><s%> a raid <S%H6584><s%> on the land. <S%H776><s%>"

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from pursuing <S%H7291><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> the Rock <S%H5553><s%> of Escape. <S%H4256><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from there <S%H8033><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> of Engedi. <S%H5872><s%>
